data:
James Scheidhauer James 
	    Scheidhauer jscheidh@depaul.edu Adjunct Faculty ​MS ​2219 North Kenmore Byrne 353 ​Jim Scheidhauer earned a BS degree in Business Administration from University of Illinois and an MS degree in Interdisciplinary Studies:  Physics & Philosophy from DePaul University.  In addition to these degrees, Jim has taken graduate level courses in a variety of disciplines from Computer Science to Liberal Studies, Neuroscience to Education, and Finance to Religious Studies.  In his free time, Jim can be found performing as an improv comedian at various Chicago theaters.  Primary Courses: LSP120:  Quantitative Reasoning and Technological Literacy LSP110:  Discover Chicago in Sound PHY150-152:  General Physics I, II, III
